mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.name,m.parentId,m.createDate,m.createId,m.updateDate,m.sort,m.href,m.remark FROM menu m LEFT JOIN role_menu_rel rm ON m.id = rm.menuId WHERE rm.roleId=#{roleId} AND m.parentId=#{parentId} AND m.state = '1' ORDER BY m.sort
